Welcome to the Vandal family!

post_text: Merrill Community Schools was able to show off our amazing facilities, programming and students to the Michigan Department of Education today. Deputy Superintendent Dr. Scott Koenigsknecht visited our District today and met with our leadership. Mrs. Gwen Glazier, Mr. Christian WIley, Mrs. April Schomaker and Mrs. Allison Jordan all presented the wonderful things happening here at Merrill. We also had 2 students talk to Dr. Koenigsknecht about their experiences, and answer questions. Laney Wiley and Conner Neuenfeldt represented our school well. In addition, Dr. Koenigsknecht toured our Welding lab and watched students designing for 3D printing with Mr. Beougher. It's always great to let everyone know about the great things going on in our schools! #VANDALPRIDE #WEAREMERRILL
